Text: FYI:This is not the new Tomb Raider, read the description carefully. There's not a lot of torrents for this game so I thought I would share it. 4.2 gig after extraction, use 7zip, or WinRAR to extract, enjoy.
Sounds cool. I've never played a Game on a TV with a remote control. Thank you!
@ 5-click, yeah, it's a bit different from the norm, it CAN get tricky with some of the timed sequences, but it's a good sit back and have a beer type of game.
